description.narrative: This activity (Health: Options contract for implementation) is a component of Health: Evidence for Action to Reduce Maternal and Neonatal Mortality in Africa reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £16,799,019. This component benefits Africa, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Reproductive health care. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services. The start date is 01-07-2011 and the end date is 30-06-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Health - Social Affairs - Health - policy, planning and administration
